designpaint

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • designpaint.Shape
      • designpaint.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    Rectangle shape that can be drawn on a Canvas
    See Also:
    Canvas

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(int id,
                 int coordinateX,
                 int coordinateY,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Creates a Rectangle at certain coordinates, on a canvas.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the shape.
        coordinateX - The X coordinate of the origin of the shape.
        coordinateY - The Y coordinate of the origin of the shape.
        width - The width of the shape.
        height - Height of the shape.
